page.title: 10Public Buildings in N/Ham/Co
page.content: The main public buildings in North Hammersmith and College Park are hospitals,namely Hammersmith hospital, St. Charles and Central Middlesex. Hammersmith hospital is famous for heart treatment and surgery.There are two private hospitals, where people have to pay for their treatment. There are fifteen schools in the area; four secondary schools for children aged between eleven and eighteen, ten primary schools and one stage school. There is also one school which has been closed due to the fall in the birth rate. There are a vast assortment of churches of all denominations,mainly in the south of the area. There are two police stations and an ambulance station and a Crown court. There is only one library and no fire station. There is also a public swimming pool, a football ground and several parks.
